About Me

Bio

Charismatic, Athletic, RoleModel.Born and Raised in Africa(Cameroon).Graduated from Texas Tech with a Degree in Mechanical Engineering.

Software Engineering

Full Stack Developer

• Developed full stack application implementing Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery using the Agile (Scrum) Methodology. Built BDD Testing.

• Built unit test using TestNG, Junit. • Utilized Jenkins for building and Selenium Web driver to create automated browsers for testing. • Designed acceptance tests using Cucumber based on user stories to promote Behavior Driven Development.

Mechanical Engineering

Process/Manufacturing

• Manage engineering projects to meet expected deadlines, budget, and quality. • Ability to lead cross functional teams independently and concurrently. • Work with all disciplines in production to generate project ideas and develop a prioritized project schedule based on the impact to business and manufacturing cost.
